name: "I can tolerate a lot" card
description: Time to be honest with yourself or someone you know? As with everything in life, it's a lot easier with a card. But this card is special, in fact perhaps a little magic! Open it and not only will it tell you who you are... but also who you can become. The back of the card has the key that will tell you how to get there. Frame the artwork provided inside for maximum exposure and effect. Follow the url on the back of the card for insights on the symbolism, quotes, videos, or songs that inspired the drawings: http://tree4all.tumblr.com/warrior It's artwork and therapy for the price of a greeting card! No need to wait for a birthday or special occasion (although it can certainly be given for those reasons). Card is 5" x 7", artwork insert is 8" x 10". Printed on cardstock and paper with 30% post-consumer-waste content. Comes with an A8 size envelop made of 100% recycled kraft paper. Frame not provided. The card will be in a sealed sleeve and sent to you in protected packaging to ensure safe delivery. Thank you for looking!

name: the designer
description: One of a series of original illustrations each developed to describe a personality type. Every illustration comes with two drawings and short poems. A lot of thoughts (and love!) goes into each drawing. While the drawings can simply be enjoyed as art, they are also intended to make you think and maybe even grow. The designer is about finding balance between order and chaos. For more information, visit: tree4all.tumblr.com/designer Hand drawn and carved onto a linoleum block, hand painted with watercolor, then scanned and treated digitally. Drawings printed digitally onto high quality BFK Rives Printing paper with torn edges. Print size measure approx. 8" x10" inch (poems are hand printed by letterpress). Each side of the artwork also available as a separate print, size 5"x7" (no letterpress). Sold unframed and unmounted. The print will be sent to you in protected packaging and sleeve to ensure safe delivery. Thank you for looking!
